document_data.title: Silverwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverwood''' is a short adventure for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 2{{nd}} edition, designed by [[Mark Liberman]], published in [[Polyhedron 85]], 1993.{{posup|85/Silverwood}}
